short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the word 'Israel' on websites to improve the online experience of those impacted by Isra*li settler colonialism

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension does one very simple thing. It replaces the word 'Israel' with 'Occupied Palestine' and "Isra*li" with "Isra*li settler" in every website to improve the online experience and mental health of those impacted by Isra*li settler colonialism". Palestinians remain the largest refugee population in the world and their right of return to their historic homeland of Palestine is enshrined in UN resolutions. Currently works in English.
